import React from 'react'; import { Button, Card, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaHeartbeat, FaMobileAlt, FaMoneyBillWave, FaPhone } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ProductPage = () => { return (

Product Details

Introducing sensAIra: An AI-powered platform that helps predict and monitor health conditions like hypertension and COPD using data from our wearable wristband.

Key Features

Predictive Analytics: AI-powered health monitoring to detect risks early. Real-Time Monitoring: Continuous tracking of vitals like heart rate, SpO2, and respiratory rate. Affordable Pricing: ₹1999 upfront + ₹99/month after the first 3 months.

How It Works

Our wristband continuously monitors your vitals and uses AI to predict potential health risks. The platform generates real-time insights, emergency alerts, and personalized care recommendations.

Pricing

₹1999 for the device + 3 months free subscription. ₹99/month thereafter (₹149 after 6 months).

); }; export default ProductPage;
